channel.title: Tutorials on NEP
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on NEP

item.title: Basic tutorials
item.description: Basic concepts There are some basic concepts that we need to know in order to create distribuited applications with robot. These concepts are described bellow. If you already have experience with frameworks such as ROS, then you can skip to the next section. Component-based software Robot software development tends to be a complex task. One way to manage this complexity is using well-conceived guidelines and design patterns, together with programming tools (such as NEP and ROS) that support these architectures.
